Maria Baker.dietary_restrictions: High fluid intake (3L/day), low oxalate, limit sodium, moderate calcium
Maria Baker.warning_signs: Severe flank pain, blood in urine, fever, inability to urinate, nausea/vomiting
Maria Baker.discharge_instructions: Drink plenty of water, strain urine for stones, follow-up in 2 weeks, emergency if unable to urinate

Karen Walker.dietary_restrictions: Diabetic diet, low sodium (2g/day), carbohydrate counting, limit processed foods
Karen Walker.warning_signs: High blood sugar, protein in urine, swelling, vision changes, foot numbness
Karen Walker.discharge_instructions: Monitor blood sugar 4 times daily, check feet daily, A1C goal <7%, follow-up in 1 month

Ashley Harris.dietary_restrictions: Low sodium (2g/day), low protein during active phase, fluid restriction if edematous
Ashley Harris.follow_up: Primary care in 2 weeks, Nephrology in 1 month

Ashley Harris.discharge_instructions: Take immunosuppressants exactly as prescribed, monitor for infections, follow-up in 2 weeks, urgent care if fever

Michelle Walker.primary_diagnosis: Urinary Tract Infection with Kidney Involvement
medications: Phenazopyridine 200mg three times daily as needed
Michelle Walker.dietary_restrictions: Increase fluid intake (2.5L/day), cranberry juice recommended, avoid irritants
Michelle Walker.warning_signs: Fever, chills, back pain, burning urination, blood in urine, confusion (elderly)
Michelle Walker.discharge_instructions: Complete full course of antibiotics, increase fluids, follow-up if symptoms persist, urgent care if fever >101F
